text: Mike Moffat (born 27 July 1982) is a Canadian luger who has competed since 1990. Competing in three Winter Olympics, he earned his best Olympic finish of 7th in 2010 (Vancouver). Other Olympic results include 9th in 2006 (Turin) and 11th in 2002 (Salt Lake).Mike Moffat. sports-reference.com Moffat's best finish at the FIL World Luge Championships was sixth in the men's doubles event at Calgary in 2001. ==References== ==External links== *2002 luge men's doubles results *2006 luge men's doubles results *FIL-Luge profile *Official website Category:1982 births Category:Canadian male lugers Category:Living people Category:Lugers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Lugers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Lugers at the 2010 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic lugers of Canada Category:Sportspeople from Calgary
title: Mike Moffat (luger)
